Sentencas: While the integration of base-load fuel cells into the built environment is expected to provide numerous benefits to the user, the steady-state and dynamic behavior of these stationary fuel cell systems can produce an undesirable impact on the grid distribution circuit at the point of connection.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: In the present paper, a load-following active power filter (LFAPF) is proposed to mitigate the grid impact of such systems and instead improve overall local power quality.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: To evaluate the strategy, the LFAPF is integrated into a SOFC system inverter with one-cycle control (OCC) to provide the fundamental benefits of a traditional active power filter (APF) while also damping out short-term line current transients.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: The LFAPF benefit is illustrated through simulation of an SOFC interconnected with the utility electric distribution system and a building electricity demand that is modeled as a dynamic non-linear load.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: Three installation cases are examined: (1) a load-following SOFC, (2) a base-loaded SOFC, and (3) an offline SOFC.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: Without LFAPF, the load-following SOFC causes load transients due to the finite SOFC response time, and the base-loaded SOFC case has transients that appear more severe because they represent a larger overall percentage of the grid-provided load.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: The integration of an LFAPF improves the steady-state behavior over the base case and mitigates voltage sags and step changes.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load

Sentencas: Thus integrating an LFAPF can, by providing useful services to both the utility and the end-user, facilitate the integration of an SOFC into the distribution system.
Titulo: Load-following active power filter for a solid oxide fuel cell supported load
